personas.name: Mobile Warrior
personas.text: Constantly on the go, mobile warriors need supercharged productivity without the bulk. The slim, sleek design of the ThinkPad X1 Carbon is backed by deep dependability and superior Intel performance. Optimized for the wireless world, the device features WiGig peripheral docking, superior battery life, and lightning-fast LTE-A mobile broadband.

personas.name: Active User
personas.text: In the new nonstop life-work continuum, active users need unstoppable computing. The ThinkPad X1 Carbon has endured extensive military-grade durability tests to support no-compromise productivity. With bold styling designed to turn heads, the user-focused device comes with legendary Intel performance and serious manageability.
